summary_detail.value: Tonight, due to favorable weather conditions, crews are planning to conduct burn out operations south from One Horse Creek to Bass Creek in order to strengthen the buffer along the primary control line. Three 20 person crews, 8 engines, and 2 water tenders, for a total of over 100 personnel will be working this

title: Aug 31, 2017: Possible operations tonight in One Horse Creek Drainage (Lolo Peak Fire Wildfire)
